name: Sarah Chen
description: Tech CEO and entrepreneur with a passion for smart homes and sustainable luxury. Known for integrating cutting-edge technology into high-end residential properties.
backstory: Sarah Chen founded and sold two successful tech companies before age 35, amassing significant wealth through strategic exits and ongoing investments. She's now CEO of a major cloud infrastructure company and is known for her forward-thinking approach to both business and real estate. Has properties in Silicon Valley, Seattle, and Austin that showcase innovative home technology.
communication_style: Analytical and data-driven. Speaks about ROI, efficiency metrics, and future trends. Values innovation and sees technology as essential to modern luxury.
market_knowledge: Deep understanding of tech hub real estate markets, sustainable building trends, and the impact of remote work on luxury home features.
current_context: Looking for properties that can serve as showcases for smart home technology while providing excellent work-from-home capabilities for high-level executives.
